metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8750 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libdwarf 20151114 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash) via a debug_abbrev section marked NOBITS in an ELF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8750` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1').
